title: No valid MSBuild was detected for the selected target.
body:
Hi guys,

When you going to create a new Cordova Project on Visual Studio 2015 and building it for Windows x86 one exception is displayed

See please the following video for more details: http://screencast.com/t/H1EBKQeLdYr0

Regards, Nicholls

nodes.body:
Based on https://github.com/MSOpenTech/cordova-windows, perhaps @sgrebnov can assist?

Also, there is Twitter and Email provided in first paragraph of this blog post: http://blogs.msdn.com/b/visualstudio/archive/2014/08/04/apache-cordova-tooling-update-with-support-for-windows-7.aspx.
I believe this has been taken care of. If not please re-open.
